title: Mitarai: Tantei Mitarai Kiyoshi no Jiken Kiroku
original_name: ミタライ 探偵御手洗潔の事件記録
sinopse:
The story centers on Kiyoshi Mitarai, a genius detective famous for having solved the Umezawa Incident. The series follows Mitarai and his assistant, Kazumi Ishioka, as they solve a wide array of mind-boggling mysteries.

(Source: ANN)
